channel.title: CVE Feed for MZ Automation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MZ Automation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2972|2024-09-16T16:34:06.151Z -- mz%20automation -- libiec61850
item.description: MZ Automation's libIEC61850 (versions 1.4 and prior; version 1.5 prior to commit a3b04b7bc4872a5a39e5de3fdc5fbde52c09e10e) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to crash the device or remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-1302|2024-09-16T18:02:57.190Z -- mz%20automation -- libiec61850
item.description: In the MZ Automation LibIEC61850 in versions prior to 1.5.1 an unauthenticated attacker can craft a goose message, which may result in a denial of service.
